publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 42
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa aqyllatadoɣon miźmor ulanlaryna Qoraḥnyn. Ńečik oĺeń taryɣadyr čyrlaḥ suvlarɣa alej ǯanym taryɣadyr saja e Teńri.
Suvsady ǯanym Teńriǵa qajjam Teńriǵa qačan kelirmiń da ḱoŕarmiń qyblalaryn Teńriniń.
Boldu maja jašym öt́ḿak ornuna ḱuń da keč́a ajtḥanda maja dušmanym har ḱuń qajdadyr teńrij śeniń.

Bularny saɣynsam da t́oǵuĺadir üśt́uḿa gilajim ki ašaredim jyjyn byla siĺkińa baryredim üv́uńa dejiń Teńriniń bijańč́ avazy byla sarnamaḥnyn da š́uḱurĺukńuń jyjyny byla tańeč́ et́uv́č́uĺarniń.
Ńe eńkajasiń ǯanym da č́uv́lejsiń üśt́uḿa išanɣyn Teńriǵa ki hanuz š́uḱur et́armiń anar jarlyɣašlary üč́uń qyblalarynyn.
E Teńrim üś- t́uḿa ǯanym eńkajadir anyn üč́uń saɣynamyn śeni jerińd́ań Jard́eńniń da Ḥermondan kiči tavdan.
Darja darjaɣa čaɣyradyr avazyna zolovlaryjnyn bar syndyrmaḥlaryj da tolɣunlaryj üśt́uḿa aštylar.
Ḱuńd́uź symarlejdyr H ševaɣatyn da keč́a byla širasy birǵaḿa tefila qajjam Teńriǵa.
Ajtamyn Teńriǵa sqalam ńeǵa unuttuj ḿeni ńeǵa qararyp juŕujmiń qysyḥlyɣyndan dušmannyn.
Qaraḥčylyḥ byla turup śuv́akĺarim üśt́uńa ḥarapladylar ḿeni tar b́eŕuv́č́u- ĺarim ajtḥanlarynda maja har ḱuń qajdadyr Teńrij śeniń.
Ńe eńkajasiń ǯanym da ńe č́uv́lejsiń üśt́uḿa išanɣyn Teńriǵa ki hanuz š́uḱur et́armiń jarlyɣašlary üč́uń qyblalarynyn Teńrimniń.
